attributes.action: Re-join the EU to Strengthen the UK's Position Amid Growing Global Threats
attributes.additional_details: In these uncertain times, the UK must not stand alone. Re-joining the EU, we can reclaim our place of strength and leadership within Europe. We urge the Government to prioritise the national interest and begin negotiations for the UK’s return to the European Union. Strengthening the UK’s security by aligning with the European Defence Union and participating in joint military initiatives. Bolstering the UK’s diplomatic influence within a powerful, unified bloc.
attributes.background: The Russian invasion of Ukraine has demonstrated the importance of a strong, coordinated response from Europe. With the United States reducing its commitment to Ukraine, the burden of ensuring European security increasingly falls on European states. The UK must stand alongside its European allies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Apply for the UK to join the European Union as a full member as soon as possible
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700005
